messages.messageBody:

messages.subject: Minecraft at ITology
messages.msgSnippet: Good morning everyone! I spoke to ITology last night (they finally returned my multiple calls), and they are now looking into doing a workshop with Minecraft!
messages.messageBody:
Good morning everyone!

I spoke to ITology last night (they finally returned my multiple calls), and they are now looking into doing a workshop with Minecraft! There is another aspect of it, Minecraft EDU and since that is truly educational, they don't see a problem or issue with it.

It's looking good! They may incorporate it into Cyber Saturdays. CS is a workshop dealing with different aspects of IT. My son goes there and it's quite informative.

Here's the link to them.
http://it-ology.org/

Anyway, here's hoping! :)
